resources.string: *Note: This rule determines whether all network traffic will be initially blocked or allowed.

lo.li: To set rules for applications > \"Apps\" tab.\n
To add a new IP or URL-based rule > \"Add Rules\" tab.\n
To view current rule > \"View Rules\" tab.\n
To view logged network traffic > \"Log\" tab.\n
To automatically generare rules blocking known malicious sites > \"Add Rules\" tab > \"Download IPs\" button.\n
To export rules > go to Apps or View Rules > menu > \"Export Rules\" > enter desired file name > press \"Save\".\n
To import rules > go to Apps or View Rules > menu > \"Import Rules\" > enter name of file containing rules > press \"Import\".\n
To set automatically created rules to be updated every 24 hours > menu > \"Settings\" > check "Enable Auto Update".\n
To switch between block/allow scheme and enable/disable logging > menu > \"Settings\".\n
To view raw IPTables rules > menu > \"Settings\" > press \"View Rules\".\n
